body: Whether it is used to hoist treasure from a pit or move supplies, a simple block-and-tackle pulley, when it is properly secured, adds a +5 circumstance bonus on Strength checks to lift heavy objects. Securing the pulley requires 1 minute.
name: Block and Tackle
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Equipment/Goods And Services/Adventuring Gear/Block and Tackle
